content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. So, what is the rental price you are thinking of for this apartment? Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in the apartment, but the location and the size are not what I'm looking for. I'm sorry, but I don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not satisfied with the location and the size of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
